text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium spathulatum is a species of fungus in the genus Penicillium which produces asperphenamate.
text.Further reading:
Nina Gunde-Cimerman; Aharon Oren; Ana Plemenitaš (2006). Adaptation to Life at High Salt Concentrations in Archaea, Bacteria, and Eukarya. Springer Science & Business Media. ISBN 978-1402036330.
